description_en: fabric materials used in bridal and formal wear.

attributes.description_en: Smooth, glossy fabric with formal sheen, widely used for bridal and evening gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 光滑亮泽的正式面料，广泛用于婚纱与晚礼服。

attributes.description_en: Sheer and airy fabric with soft drape, perfect for flowing designs.
attributes.description_zh: 轻薄透明，柔软飘逸，适合流动感设计。

attributes.description_en: Affordable chiffon alternative with good drape and easy care.
attributes.description_zh: 价格实惠的雪纺替代品，垂感良好且易于护理。

attributes.description_en: Delicate openwork textile with intricate patterns, iconic for romantic designs.
attributes.description_zh: 精致的镂空织物，具有复杂花纹，是浪漫风格代表。

attributes.description_en: Fine netting fabric used for veils and voluminous skirts.
attributes.description_zh: 精细网状织物，用于面纱与蓬松裙摆。

attributes.description_en: Crisp, transparent fabric used for volume and structure.
attributes.description_zh: 挺括透明的面料，用于营造体积感与结构感。

attributes.description_en: Premium silk from mulberry-fed silkworms, known for its softness, luster and smooth texture.
attributes.description_zh: 桑蚕喂养的优质真丝，以其柔软、光泽和光滑质感著称。

attributes.description_en: Premium chiffon made from silk, offering superior drape and luxury feel.
attributes.description_zh: 由真丝制成的优质雪纺，具有卓越的垂感和奢华触感。

attributes.description_en: Silky, smooth fabric with excellent drape used for bias-cut gowns and flowing designs.
attributes.description_zh: 光滑柔顺、垂感极佳的面料，常用于斜裁礼服和流动感设计。

attributes.description_en: Textured surface fabric with graceful drape and movement.
attributes.description_zh: 表面有细褶纹理，垂感优雅富有动感。

attributes.description_en: Lightweight silk crepe with a slightly pebbled texture, perfect for elegant draping.
attributes.description_zh: 轻盈的丝质绉布，带有轻微鹅卵石纹理，完美适合优雅垂坠。

attributes.description_en: Heavy, luxurious satin with excellent structure and formal appearance.
attributes.description_zh: 厚重奢华的缎面，结构优良，外观正式。

attributes.description_en: Satin with a soft, flowing drape, perfect for elegant gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 具有柔软流动垂感的缎面，适合优雅礼服。

attributes.description_en: Satin blended with elastane for comfortable body-hugging silhouettes.
attributes.description_zh: 与弹性纤维混纺的缎面，适合贴身剪裁的礼服。

attributes.description_en: Thick silk-blend satin with structure and luster, ideal for sculptural gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 厚实的丝绸混纺缎，挺括有光泽，适合雕塑型礼服。

attributes.description_en: Delicate French lace with fine floral patterns, highly prized for bridal wear.
attributes.description_zh: 精致的法式蕾丝，具有精美的花卉图案，在婚纱中备受推崇。

attributes.description_en: Heavy French lace with raised patterns, perfect for structured gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 厚重的法式蕾丝，具有凸起图案，适合结构化礼服。

attributes.description_en: Heavy lace without net backing, creating bold geometric patterns.
attributes.description_zh: 无网底的重型蕾丝，创造出大胆的几何图案。

attributes.description_en: Rich pile fabric with deep texture, ideal for winter formal wear.
attributes.description_zh: 绒面丰厚、质感深邃，适合冬季礼服。

attributes.description_en: Luxurious velvet made from silk, offering the finest texture and drape.
attributes.description_zh: 由真丝制成的奢华天鹅绒，提供最精致的质感和垂感。

attributes.description_en: Velvet with a crushed appearance, creating a unique textured effect.
attributes.description_zh: 具有压花外观的天鹅绒，创造出独特的纹理效果。

attributes.description_en: Softer velvet-like fabric often used for less formal luxurious pieces.
attributes.description_zh: 类似天鹅绒但更柔软的面料，常用于非正式的奢华单品。

attributes.description_en: Crisp, rustling fabric with subtle sheen, used for structured gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 挺括带响的面料，微光泽，常用于结构化婚纱。

attributes.name_zh: 镀膜 / 金属印花塔夫
attributes.description_en: Taffeta or similar base with metallic foil or print for dramatic shine.
attributes.description_zh: 在塔夫等基布上做金属镀层或印花，产生强烈光泽效果。

attributes.description_en: Wild silk with natural golden color and slightly rougher texture than mulberry silk.
attributes.description_zh: 野生蚕丝，具有天然金黄色和比桑蚕丝略粗糙的质感。

attributes.description_en: Silk with slub texture producing natural irregularities and shine, good for structured gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 具有天然丝节纹理和光泽，适合结构化礼服。

attributes.description_en: Silk-like fabric with slubby texture, vintage and textured appearance.
attributes.description_zh: 类似真丝的面料，带有丝节感，复古且有纹理感。

attributes.description_en: Very crisp, high-twist silk or silk-blend fabric used in couture for architectural silhouettes.
attributes.description_zh: 极为挺括的高捻丝或混纺面料，用于高级时装的建筑型廓形。

attributes.description_en: Handwoven Indian silk with rich brocade patterns, used in South Asian bridalwear.
attributes.description_zh: 印度手工织锦丝，图案华美，常用于南亚婚礼礼服。

attributes.description_en: South Indian heavy silk with distinctive borders, used in ceremonial bridal sarees.
attributes.description_zh: 南印浓重丝织，边饰显著，常用于仪式性婚礼纱丽。

attributes.description_en: Semi-synthetic fiber mimicking silk sheen and drape at lower cost.
attributes.description_zh: 半合成纤维，模仿真丝光泽与垂感，但成本较低。

attributes.description_en: Eco-friendly regenerated fiber with silky touch and good drape.
attributes.description_zh: 环保再生纤维，手感光滑，垂感良好。

attributes.description_en: Thick, structured synthetic fabric used for sculptural modern gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 厚实富有弹性的合成面料，常用于现代雕塑型礼服。

attributes.description_en: Soft stretch knit used for minimalist or comfortable gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 柔软有弹力的针织面料，适用于极简或舒适款礼服。

attributes.description_en: Woven fabric with intricate raised patterns, elegant and structured.
attributes.description_zh: 机织浮花面料，复杂优雅且富结构感。

attributes.description_en: Heavy jacquard often woven with metallic threads for opulent looks.
attributes.description_zh: 厚重提花织物，常掺金银线，营造华丽质感。

attributes.description_en: Reversible jacquard with contrasting matte and shiny areas.
attributes.description_zh: 可逆的提花织物，具有对比的哑光和光泽区域。

attributes.description_en: Net fabrics used for overlays, illusion effects and structural layers.
attributes.description_zh: 网状面料，用作覆盖层、透视效果以及结构层。

attributes.description_en: Stretchy mesh fabric used for support and structure in modern gowns.
attributes.description_zh: 弹性网布面料，用于现代礼服中的支撑和结构。

attributes.name_zh: 激光切割薄纱 / 网纱
attributes.description_en: Tulle/net with laser-cut edges or patterns for precision decorative motifs.
attributes.description_zh: 通过激光切割形成精细边缘或图案的薄纱/网纱，装饰效果精确。

attributes.description_en: Decorative fabric with sewn sequins for sparkle and glamour.
attributes.description_zh: 镶嵌亮片的装饰性面料，增加闪耀感与华丽度。

attributes.description_en: Base fabric with decorative embroidery, often couture or handmade.
attributes.description_zh: 底布绣花的装饰面料，经常用于高定或手工工艺。

attributes.description_en: Fabric woven with metallic yarns or threads giving shimmer, common in evening wear.
attributes.description_zh: 掺金属纱的织物，闪耀光泽，常见于晚礼服。

attributes.description_en: Lightweight crepe-like fabric with slightly rough texture.
attributes.description_zh: 轻盈略粗糙的面料，比雪纺更具弹性与垂度。

attributes.description_en: Light puckered cotton fabric ideal for warm climates and casual weddings.
attributes.description_zh: 轻盈有褶皱的棉质面料，适合热带或休闲婚礼。

attributes.description_en: Embroidered cotton varieties with holes or dots, used for vintage or pastoral looks.
attributes.description_zh: 带孔或点纹的棉质刺绣面料，常用于复古或田园风格。

attributes.name_zh: 环保混纺 / 再生面料
attributes.description_en: Recycled polyester blends, organic cotton blends and other sustainable fabric options.
attributes.description_zh: 再生聚酯混纺、有机棉混纺等可持续面料选择。

attributes.name_zh: 3D 打印面料 / 技术面料
attributes.description_en: Advanced materials used in concept and couture, including 3D printed elements.
attributes.description_zh: 概念与高定中使用的先进材料，包含3D打印元素与高科技织物。
